sen.j: 山口華楊（やまぐちかよう、1899年10月3日 - 1984年3月16日）は、日本画家。
sen.e: Kayo YAMAGUCHI (born on October 3, 1899 and died on March 16, 1984) was a Japanese-style painter.
Kayo YAMAGUCHI (October 3, 1899 - March 16, 1984) was a Japanese-style painter.
Kayo YAMAGUCHI (October 3, 1899 - March 16, 1984) was a Japanese-style painter.

sen.j: 京都府京都市中京区生まれ。
sen.e: He was born in Nakagyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
He was born in Nakagyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
He was born in Nakagyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 写生中心の画風で、動物画を得意とした。
sen.e: His painting style was sketching and he was good at painting animals.
His painting style was sketching and was good at painting animals.
His painting style was sketching and was good at painting animals.
He studied under Goun NISHIMURA.
He studied under Goun NISHIMURA.
He studied under Goun NISHIMURA.

sen.j: - 京都市立絵画専門学校（現：京都市立芸術大学）別科卒業
sen.e: He graduated from s special course of Kyoto-shiritsu Kaiga Senmon Gakko (Kyoto City Specialist School of Painting) (present day, Kyoto City University of Arts).
He graduated from the special course of Kyoto-shiritsu Kaiga Senmon Gakko (Kyoto City Specialist School of Painting) (present day, Kyoto City University of Arts).
He graduated from the special course of Kyoto-shiritsu Kaiga Senmon Gakko (Kyoto City Specialist School of Painting) (present day, Kyoto City University of Arts).
He was a teacher of that school.
Subsequently, he also worked there as a teacher.
sen.cmt: より自然な表現に変えました。
sen.e: Subsequently, he also worked there as a teacher.
He organized painting school, Shincho sha.
He organized painting school, Shincho sha.
He organized painting school, Shincho sha.

sen.j: - 京都日本画家協会理事長
sen.e: He was the chairperson of Japanese-style painter association.
He was the chairperson of the Japanese-style painter association.
He was the chairperson of the Japanese-style painter association.
He was awarded a prize, Award of the Japan Art Academy.
He received the Award of the Japan Art Academy.
sen.cmt: より自然な表現に変えました。
sen.e: He received the Award of the Japan Art Academy.

sen.j: - 日本美術展覧会評議員
sen.e: He was a councillor of the Japan Fine Arts Exhibition.
He was a councillor of the Japan Fine Arts Exhibition.
He was a councillor of the Japan Fine Arts Exhibition.
He was a director of the Japan Fine Arts Exhibition (JFAE).
He was a director of the Japan Fine Arts Exhibition (JFAE).
He was a director of the Japan Fine Arts Exhibition (JFAE).

sen.j: - 京都市文化功労者、日本芸術院会員
sen.e: He was Bunkakorosha (Person of Cultural Merits) of Kyoto City and a member of the Japan Art Academy.
He was Bunkakorosha (Person of Cultural Merits) of Kyoto City and a member of the Japan Art Academy.
He was Bunkakorosha (Person of Cultural Merits) of Kyoto City and a member of the Japan Art Academy.
He received the 3rd class of the Order of the Sacred Treasure.

He received the 3rd class of the Order of the Sacred Treasure.
He was an adviser of the Japan Fine Arts Exhibition (JFAE).
